p.s: A PHP5 template system that uses PHP for its logic; provides path searching, plugins, filters, and an optional compiler system.
p.d: Savant3 is an object-oriented system to help keep manipulation logic ('model' or 'controller' scripts) separate from display logic ('view' scripts) using PHP-based templates. Savant3 is E_STRICT compliant for PHP5, provides a plugin model for convenience methods, supports output filter callbacks, allows for custom compilers, and provides path searching for themed (skinned) applications.
